G

getDotSource() - Method in class graphViz.GraphViz
Returns the graph's source description in dot language.
getGraph(String, String) - Method in class graphViz.GraphViz
Returns the graph as an image in binary format.
graphViz - package graphViz
 
GraphViz - Class in graphViz
Purpose: GraphViz Java API Description: With this Java class you can simply call dot from your Java programs Example usage: GraphViz gv = new GraphViz(); gv.addln(gv.start_graph()); gv.addln("A -> B;"); gv.addln("A -> C;"); gv.addln(gv.end_graph()); System.out.println(gv.getDotSource()); String type = "gif"; File out = new File("out." + type); // out.gif in this example gv.writeGraphToFile( gv.getGraph( gv.getDotSource(), type ), out );
GraphViz() - Constructor for class graphViz.GraphViz
Constructor: creates a new GraphViz object that will contain a graph.
GraphVizConverter - Class in cz.muni.fi.pb138.scxml2svg
Class enabling user to style and visualize finite automaton described in DOT format to output SVG image using GraphViz functionality.
GraphVizConverter() - Constructor for class cz.muni.fi.pb138.scxml2svg.GraphVizConverter
